title: Training Troubles
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>I’m kind of stuck... As the weather gets hotter, doing too intense a workout could be harmful. But we can’t improve if we only do light workouts just because it’s hot.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Umi-san, you put that much thought into creating our training schedule?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Well, it’s not like I have it all figured out. I’ve read a few books on it, and there are many different approaches and ways of thinking. I’m also not sure whether or not they would suit us...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>So in the end, we really have to try things out ourselves and judge based on that, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, all we can do is try things out and keep searching for what works best for us through trial and error.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Amazing... Everyone in μ’s is really amazing! I want to be fearless in the face of trial and error too, and take on all kinds of challenges!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Any and all challenges?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Setsuna... Would you like to try mountain climbing training with me? Mountain climbing is fantastic as a leisure activity, but it also has many benefits as a form of training.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Really? I’d love to learn more about it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Great!! It’s the perfect season for it right now. Let’s go climbing next weekend!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Alright!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
